languages.text: {n}Почтительно поклонившись священной машине, Паскаль шепчет{/n} "Дух сей машины своенравен и насторожен, но измучен. Шрамы от смиряющих бинарных литаний исполосовали его изощренный разум". {n}Техножрец аккуратно убирает с панели ввода оторванный человеческий палец, шепчет молитву-извинение когитатору и небрежно отбрасывает кусочек плоти.{/n}

{n}Pasqal bows reverently to the sacred machine and whispers,{/n} "This machine's spirit is wayward and apprehensive, for it is tormented. Its intricate mind carries many scars from pacifying binharic litanies." {n}The Tech-Priest carefully removes the severed human finger from the input panel, whispers an apologetic prayer to the cogitator, and casually tosses the piece of flesh away.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Почтительно поклонившись священной машине, Паскаль шепчет{/n} "Дух сей машины своенравен и насторожен, но измучен. Шрамы от смиряющих бинарных литаний исполосовали его изощренный разум". {n}Техножрец аккуратно убирает с панели ввода оторванный человеческий палец, шепчет молитву-извинение когитатору и небрежно отбрасывает кусочек плоти.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal hace una reverencia a la máquina sagrada y susurra:{/n} «Este espíritu máquina está descarriado y preocupado porque ha sido torturado. Su compleja mente lleva las cicatrices de numerosas letanías en binario». {n}El tecnosacerdote cuidadosamente retira el dedo humano cortado del panel de entrada, susurra una plegaria de disculpa al cogitador y tira el dedo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal bows reverently to the sacred machine and whispers,{/n} "This machine's spirit is wayward and apprehensive, for it is tormented. Its intricate mind carries many scars from pacifying binharic litanies." {n}The Tech-Priest carefully removes the severed human finger from the input panel, whispers an apologetic prayer to the cogitator, and casually tosses the piece of flesh away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal hace una reverencia a la máquina sagrada y susurra:{/n} «Este espíritu máquina está descarriado y preocupado porque ha sido torturado. Su compleja mente lleva las cicatrices de numerosas letanías en binario». {n}El tecnosacerdote cuidadosamente retira el dedo humano cortado del panel de entrada, susurra una plegaria de disculpa al cogitador y tira el dedo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal s'incline avec révérence devant la machine sacrée et murmure :{/n} « Cet esprit de la machine est capricieux et soucieux, car il est en proie au tourment. Sa conscience complexe porte les traces de nombreuses litanies binhaires pacificatrices. » {n}Le technoprêtre retire soigneusement le doigt humain de l'écran de saisie, murmure une prière contrite à l'attention du cogitateur et jette négligemment le morceau de chair.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal bows reverently to the sacred machine and whispers,{/n} "This machine's spirit is wayward and apprehensive, for it is tormented. Its intricate mind carries many scars from pacifying binharic litanies." {n}The Tech-Priest carefully removes the severed human finger from the input panel, whispers an apologetic prayer to the cogitator, and casually tosses the piece of flesh away.{/n}

Sa conscience complexe porte les traces de nombreuses litanies binhaires pacificatrices. » {n}Le technoprêtre retire soigneusement le doigt humain de l'écran de saisie, murmure une prière contrite à l'attention du cogitateur et jette négligemment le morceau de chair.{/n}

languages.text: {n}パスカルは聖なる機械に恭しく頭を下げ、囁く。{/n}「この機械精霊は強情で心配性です。苦しみに苛まれているのです。その複雑な精神は、バイナリック祈祷を鎮めようとしてできた無数の傷が付いている」{n}技術司祭は千切れた人間の指を入力パネルから慎重に外し、考算機への謝罪の祈りの言葉をささやく。そして、何ごともなかったかのように、肉片を投げ捨てた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal bows reverently to the sacred machine and whispers,{/n} "This machine's spirit is wayward and apprehensive, for it is tormented. Its intricate mind carries many scars from pacifying binharic litanies." {n}The Tech-Priest carefully removes the severed human finger from the input panel, whispers an apologetic prayer to the cogitator, and casually tosses the piece of flesh away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは聖なる機械に恭しく頭を下げ、囁く。{/n}「この機械精霊は強情で心配性です。苦しみに苛まれているのです。その複雑な精神は、バイナリック祈祷を鎮めようとしてできた無数の傷が付いている」{n}技術司祭は千切れた人間の指を入力パネルから慎重に外し、考算機への謝罪の祈りの言葉をささやく。そして、何ごともなかったかのように、肉片を投げ捨てた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡虔诚地向这台神圣机器鞠了一躬，低声开了口。{/n}“这台机器的机魂由于饱受摧残，已经迷失了方向。它复杂的思维中带着许多二进制的亵渎之语留下的伤痕。”{n}帕斯卡小心翼翼地从输入面板上取下一段被切断的人类手指，低声向沉思者表达了歉意，之后随手扔掉了那截手指。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal bows reverently to the sacred machine and whispers,{/n} "This machine's spirit is wayward and apprehensive, for it is tormented. Its intricate mind carries many scars from pacifying binharic litanies." {n}The Tech-Priest carefully removes the severed human finger from the input panel, whispers an apologetic prayer to the cogitator, and casually tosses the piece of flesh away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡虔诚地向这台神圣机器鞠了一躬，低声开了口。{/n}“这台机器的机魂由于饱受摧残，已经迷失了方向。它复杂的思维中带着许多二进制的亵渎之语留下的伤痕。”{n}帕斯卡小心翼翼地从输入面板上取下一段被切断的人类手指，低声向思考器表达了歉意，之后随手扔掉了那截手指。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal verneigt sich ehrfürchtig vor der heiligen Maschine und flüstert:{/n} "Der Geist dieser Maschine ist launisch und unruhig, denn er wird gepeinigt. Sein ausgeklügelter Verstand trägt viele Narben von binhären Befriedungslitaneien." {n}Der Techpriester entfernt vorsichtig den abgetrennten menschlichen Finger aus dem Eingabefeld, flüstert ein entschuldigendes Gebet zu dem Cogitator, und wirft das Stück Fleisch achtlos beiseite.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal bows reverently to the sacred machine and whispers,{/n} "This machine's spirit is wayward and apprehensive, for it is tormented. Its intricate mind carries many scars from pacifying binharic litanies." {n}The Tech-Priest carefully removes the severed human finger from the input panel, whispers an apologetic prayer to the cogitator, and casually tosses the piece of flesh away.{/n}

Sein ausgeklügelter Verstand trägt viele Narben von binhären Befriedungslitaneien." {n}Der Techpriester entfernt vorsichtig den abgetrennten menschlichen Finger aus dem Eingabefeld, flüstert ein entschuldigendes Gebet zu dem Cogitator, und wirft das Stück Fleisch achtlos beiseite.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, kutsal makinenin önünde hürmetle eğilip fısıldıyor.{/n} "Bu makinenin ruhu asi ve evhamlı. Çektiği acılar sebebiyle bu hâle gelmiş. Gelişmiş zihni, baskılayıcı ikilidil dualarından kalma sayısız yara izine sahip." {n}Tekno Rahip; girdi panelindeki kesik insan parmağını oradan alıyor, kavramsayara özür dileyen bir dua okuyor ve et parçasını bir kenara fırlatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal bows reverently to the sacred machine and whispers,{/n} "This machine's spirit is wayward and apprehensive, for it is tormented. Its intricate mind carries many scars from pacifying binharic litanies." {n}The Tech-Priest carefully removes the severed human finger from the input panel, whispers an apologetic prayer to the cogitator, and casually tosses the piece of flesh away.{/n}
